features.name: FileUpload
features.description: Drag-and-drop audio file upload component with validation for MP3/WAV files up to 10MB. Shows file preview with duration and size.

features.name: AudioProcessing
features.description: Simulated audio stem separation using Web Audio API. Splits audio into vocals, drums, bass, and other stems.

features.name: ProcessPage
features.description: Processing page with visual progress dashboard showing real-time status of each stem extraction with animated cards.

features.name: StemPlayer
features.description: Audio player component for individual stems with play/pause, volume control, waveform visualization, and download functionality.

features.name: StemGrid
features.description: Grid layout displaying all 4 separated stems with individual players and a download-all button.

features.name: ResultsPage
features.description: Results page displaying separated stems with playback controls, download options, and tips for using stems.

features.name: HomePage
features.description: Landing page with hero section, file upload component, and feature highlights.

features.name: Layout
features.description: Root layout with Outfit font, gradient background, header with navigation, and footer.

features.name: DesignSystem
features.description: Global CSS with Deep Void theme, glassmorphism effects, neon accent colors, and custom animations.
